Title: 6. Wisma Geylang Serai
Description: 17th-31st May  View this post on Instagram A post shared by Wisma Geylang Serai (@wgeylangserai)  It’s not just the bazaar that happens at Geylang . Wisma Geylang Serai (WGS) has a bunch of free activities lined up to celebrate community and culture. Every weekend, you can join their refreshed Gerak-Gerak Geylang exercise sessions or catch local performances during Riuh Seni. Keep an eye out for special events like Sari Derhaka, a traditional Malay theatre show on 17th May, and Sayembara Bisikan Pena on 24th May, showcasing young writers. There’s also a community cycling event, Cyclation #SG60Bersama, on 25th May. The month wraps up with Jijok Angin on 31st May, a 2-day festival of Malay performing arts with shows and workshops. Admission: Free Venue: Wisma Geylang Serai Dates: 17th-31st May
